INSTRUCTIONS TO VOTERS:
1. Fill out this ballot SECRETLY in the voting booth.
2. To VOTE, CONNECT THE ARROW pointing to your choice, like this: B
3. DO NOT FOLD THE BALLOT. After voting, FEED THE BALLOT into the scanner. &space;&space;&space;&space;

INSTRUCTIONS TO VOTERS:
1. Fill out this ballot SECRETLY in the voting booth.
2. To VOTE, COMPLETELY FILL THE OVAL to the right of the candidate for whom you wish to vote, like this: A
3. DO NOT FOLD THE BALLOT. After voting, FEED THE BALLOT into the scanner.

INSTRUCTIONS TO POLL WORKER:
1. Insert this control ballot to activate audio voting.
2. After activation, please remove ballot from tabulator.
